WYSIWYM.transformer
Class TextPlanner

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.transformer.TextPlanner
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrowsingPlanner, QueryPlanner
public class TextPlanner
extends Object

TextPlanner plans the text; it creates a text plan from a semantic graph. This version does very limited aggregation; it's better to use ContentPlanner.

Version:
1.0 2006/11/13, 1.2 20-12-2007
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

getSetOrder

public static List<String> getSetOrder()
Returns the order in which paragraphs should be realised. THIS IS DOMAIN-SENSITIVE INFORMATION! FUTURE VERSIONS SHOULD GET THIS SOMEHOW OUT OF AN ONTOLOGY, OR POSSIBLY A SEPARATE TEXT FILE. Another reason to use ContentPlanner, which does get this information from the ontology model.

Returns:
List of headers

map

protected DependencyTree map(SGEdge edge,
                             SGNode sgSource)
                      throws IOException,
                             TextPlanningException
Maps the given edge of the semantic graph to a Dependency Tree. The target node is mapped to a DTNode, and the method recurses the map the target node.

Parameters:
edge - The edge to be mapped
sgSource - The source node of the edge in the semantic graph node has been realised (and so whether it should be an anchor or not)
Returns:
DependencyTree
Throws:
IOException
TextPlanningException

mapAggregate

protected DependencyTree mapAggregate(SGEdge[] l,
                                      SGNode sgSource)
                               throws IOException,
                                      TextPlanningException
Maps a list of edges with the same label to a series of near-identical dependency trees, which will be aggregated in the surface realiser

Parameters:
l - SGEdge[] with edges to be mapped
sgSource - The DTNode corresponding to the source node
Returns:
DependencyTreeTransformer
Throws:
IOException
TextPlanningException
